Controllers.​Scans.​scans2poam

This is the scans2poam applet

See Also

Models.Scans.scans2poam

Variables
Applet Variables
scanFiles

the scan files that are being combined into the scans2poam report

scans

the findings from the various SCAP, ACAS and CKL scans

poamArr

The array of findings that will populate the poam and the rar
